tool_description: Creates personalized prayer schedules based on user preferences, available time slots, and selected prayer traditions.

user_timezone.description: User's timezone in IANA format (e.g., America/New_York)

daily_start_time.description: Preferred daily start time in HH:MM format

daily_end_time.description: Preferred daily end time in HH:MM format

prayer_frequency.description: Frequency preference: daily, twice_daily, three_times_daily, five_times_daily, custom

tradition.description: Spiritual tradition: christian, islamic, jewish, buddhist, hindu, secular_meditation, custom

exclude_days.description: Days to exclude from schedule (monday, tuesday, etc.)

error_messages: Invalid timezone format: Use IANA timezone format like America/New_York or Europe/London
Invalid time format: Use HH:MM format (24-hour) for start and end times
Invalid time range: daily_start_time must be before daily_end_time
Unsupported tradition: Use one of [christian, islamic, jewish, buddhist, hindu, secular_meditation, custom]
Invalid frequency: Use one of [daily, twice_daily, three_times_daily, five_times_daily, custom]
Invalid flexibility level: Use one of [strict, moderate, flexible]
usage: Provide user timezone, daily time preferences, prayer frequency, and spiritual tradition. Optionally specify scheduling flexibility and days to exclude. Returns a structured prayer schedule.

schedule_id.description: Unique identifier for the created schedule

prayer_times.description: Array of scheduled prayer times in HH:MM format

prayer_names.description: Array of prayer/meditation names corresponding to times

total_daily_duration.description: Total daily prayer time in minutes
